description: iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ will launch in China on May 20 alongside the Pad 5 series, Watch 5, TWS Air 3 and more devices. The upcoming Neo 10 Pro+ smartphone will come with a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC and a 2K display. Now, the company has revealed the RAM, storage and a few key other details about the phone.
title: iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ Key Specifications Revealed Ahead of May 20 Debut; Will Feature LPDDR5x Ultra RAM, UFS 4.1 Storage

description: Microsoft 365 apps on Windows 10 are getting an extension. The Redmond-based tech giant recently updated its support page to announce that the Microsoft 365 apps (also known as Office apps) will continue to get security updates till 2028. With the latest development, the Windows maker made a U-turn on its previous decision that these apps would not be supported after October 14.
title: Microsoft 365 Apps to Receive Security Updates on Windows 10 Until 2028

description: Oppo will take the wraps off the Reno 14 series on May 15 in China. Just days before the formal launch, the Chinese tech brand has shared new teasers online, disclosing the key specifications of the Reno 14 Pro. The Oppo Reno 14 Pro is confirmed to come with a 6.83-inch screen with minimal bezels. It will offer battery upgrades over last year's Reno 13 Pro.
title: Oppo Reno 14 Pro Display, Battery Details Revealed Ahead of Debut on May 15

description: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge earlier this week with a 5.8mm thin design. The thinnest Galaxy S series smartphone is yet to reach the hands of customers in India, but rumours about the Galaxy S26 lineup, particularly the Galaxy S26 Edge model, are already swirling on the Web. Samsung is said to replace one of the phones in the Galaxy S26 lineup with an Edge model next year.
title: Samsung Reportedly Intends to Replace Galaxy S26+ With Galaxy S26 Edge Model Next Year

description: Android 16, the next big operating system (OS) update, will be released for Samsung Galaxy devices “this summer”, a company spokesperson confirmed during the sidelines of The Android Show: I/O Edition on Tuesday. Google’s prelude to its annual I/O 2025 developer conference played host to a series of Android-related announcements, which also included a tentative release timeline for Android 16.
title: Android 16 Will Arrive on Galaxy Devices ‘This Summer’, Confirms Samsung Official

description: Apple is reportedly developing brain-computer interfaces (BCIs) to let people use its devices without lifting a finger. As per the report, the Cupertino-based tech giant has partnered with Synchron, a medtech startup specialising in developing implantable BCIs, to create a new standard for this technology. The startup’s first device to follow this standard is reportedly in the early testing phase currently.
title: Apple Reportedly Partnering With Synchron to Develop Brain-Computer Interfaces

description: India's cabinet has approved a new semiconductor plant, a joint venture between HCL Technologies and Taiwan's Foxconn. The plant will be located near the Jewar airport in the northern state of Uttar Pradesh.
title: India Approves HCL-Foxconn Joint Venture Semiconductor Unit

description: MediaTek Dimensity 9400e was launched by the Taiwanese chipmaker on Wednesday. Positioned to compete with Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8s Gen 4, the Dimensity 9400e features an All Big Core CPU architecture, with four Cortex-X4 cores clocked at 3.4GHz, and a 12-core Immortalis-G720 GPU with hardware ray tracing. The new chipset also supports on-device operation of large language models and enables Wi-Fi 7 and Bluetooth 6.0 connectivity.
title: MediaTek Dimensity 9400e Unveiled, Will Debut on Realme GT 7 and OnePlus Ace 5 Racing Edition

description: Realme GT 7 will launch in India alongside other global markets on May 27. The smartphone has been confirmed to pack a 7,000mAh battery with support for 120W wired fast charging. The company has now revealed the chipset details of the upcoming handset. Some display features have been teased as well. The Realme GT 7 will be equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 9400e SoC in global markets.
title: Realme GT 7 Confirmed to Get MediaTek Dimensity 9400e SoC Ahead of May 27 Launch

description: Apple researchers released a new artificial intelligence (AI) model that can generate 3D views from multiple 2D images. The large language model (LLM), dubbed Matrix3D, was developed by the company’s Machine Learning team, in collaboration with Nanjing University and the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST). The Cupertino-based tech giant has made the AI model available to the open community, and it can be downloaded via Apple’s listing on GitHub.
title: Apple Researchers Introduce Matrix3D, a Unified AI Model That Can Turn 2D Photos Into 3D Objects

description: Realme Neo 7 Turbo will be launching soon in China, the company confirmed today. The Chinese tech brand has not disclosed the launch date yet, but it has opened pre-orders for the Neo series smartphone in its home country. The Realme Neo 7 Turbo is teased to offer powerful performance. It is expected to arrive as a close sibling of the Realme Neo 7, Neo 7 SE, and Neo 7x.
title: Realme Neo 7 Turbo Confirmed to Launch This Month, Pre-Reservations Begin

description: Slack — the cloud-based team communication platform — is rolling out a new feature which makes checking notifications easier. Users will now find a new “Mark as Read” option when receiving a notification from Slack. As the name suggests, this feature will mark the message as read from the notification window itself, eliminating the need to manually open the Slack application and check unread messages.
title: Slack Rolling Out ‘Mark as Read’ Option in Notifications for Its Android App

description: Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw inaugurated two new state-of-the-art design facilities of Renesas Electronics India Private Limited located in Noida and Bengaluru this week. He added that India's talent strength and shared Indo-Japan strategic interests will help reinvent the global semiconductor lifecycle.
title: Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw Unveils Chip Manufacturing Facilities in Noida, Bengaluru

description: FalconX has announced a partnered with the Standard Chartered bank on Wednesday. Under the partnership, FalconX said it will integrate the bank's traditional finance infrastructure into its own offerings and cater to institutional investors.
title: FalconX Partners With Standard Chartered to Serve Institutional Crypto Investors

description: Itel A90 was launched in India on Wednesday. The smartphone is equipped with an octa-core Unisoc T7100 chipset paired with 4GB of RAM. It is offered in 64GB and 128GB storage variants and is currently available in retail stores in the country. The Itel A80 successor sports a 6.6-inch screen with a Dynamic Bar feature and comes with a 100-day free screen replacement offer.
title: Itel A90 With Unisoc T7100 Chipset, 13-Megapixel Main Camera Launched in India

description: Airtel services suffered a brief outage on the evening of Tuesday in various parts of India. Many Airtel users took to social media to complain about the interruption of service and highlighted the issues they were facing. According to a downtime tracking website, the outage was first reported after 7:00pm on May 13, and it continued till 11:35pm.
title: Airtel Down: Airtel Services Restored After Suffering Brief Outage in Several Parts of India

description: Alcatel is set to re-enter the Indian smartphone market with the Alcatel V3 Ultra. While the exact launch date is still under wraps, the brand, which is operated independently by TCL Communication, has shared new teasers about the device on social media platforms. The Alcatel V3 Ultra is confirmed to offer dedicated display modes for different activities. Meanwhile, a new leak suggests that the Alcatel V3 series will launch in the last week of May.
title: Alcatel V3 Ultra's New Teasers Show Design, Dedicated Display Modes; India Launch Date Leaked

description: Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra, Amy Hennig’s action-adventure superhero title, has been delayed to 2026. The game was set for launch in 2025, but didn’t have a confirmed release date. Developer Skydance Games said Tuesday it needed more time to further polish the game.
title: Amy Hennig's Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra Delayed to Early 2026

description: Apple on Tuesday revealed new accessibility features coming to iOS 19, macOS 16, watchOS 12 later this year. App Store listings will gain Accessibility Nutrition Labels, Mac users will get a new Magnifier app for zooming, while blind users will get a new Braille Access feature for notes and calculations. The Apple Watch will introduce support for Live Captions with watchOS 12, enhancing accessibility for a wider range of users.
title: Apple Unveils Accessibility Nutrition Labels, Magnifier for Mac, Braille Access and More

description: Lava Shark 5G could soon join the Lava Shark 4G variant, which was unveiled in India in March. Details of the purported handset have surfaced online, suggesting its design and colour options. The 5G version is said to come with a dual rear camera unit. The smartphone has also appeared on a popular benchmarking website, which hints at the chipset, RAM and operating system features of the Lava Shark 5G.
title: Lava Shark 5G Design, Colour Options, Key Specifications Surface Online

description: Microsoft said on Tuesday it was laying off less than three percent of its workforce, or around 6,000 employees. The cuts will be across all levels and geographies and are likely the largest since Microsoft laid off 10,000 employees in 2023.
title: Microsoft to Lay Off Around Three Percent of Workforce in Organisation-Wide Cuts

description: The Moto Book 60 has a premium and sleek design language. The laptop packs a 14-inch 2.5K OLED display that offers decent colours. It also features a powerful Intel Core 5 210H  processor that can deliver decent performance and provides a long-lasting battery life. The device also features a decent keyboard with decent key travel and a large touchpad for a smooth typing and scrolling experience.
title: Moto Book 60 Review: Premium Design Meets Practicality

description: Nothing Phone 3 price and launch timeline details were teased by Nothing CEO Carl Pei at Google I/O 2025. Not much is known about the premium Nothing Phone 3, which is expected to arrive as the successor to the Nothing Phone 2. Nothing has managed to keep its upcoming smartphone a well-guarded secret. The Nothing Phone 2 was launched in 2023, and so, we expected the Phone 3 to arrive in 2024, but we got the Phone 2a series instead. A few weeks ago, we got the Phone 3a series as well.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Price, Launch Timeline Teased by Nothing CEO Carl Pei Ahead of Google I/O 2025

description: Samsung on Wednesday announced the integration of Gemini, Google’s artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot, into its lineup of wearables. Samsung Galaxy Watch and Galaxy Buds 3 series users will soon be able to leverage the AI assistant for setting up reminders, summarising texts, getting weather updates, and other activities that the AI bot previously allowed on phones. With this move, the company expands the presence of AI features across all devices in the Galaxy ecosystem.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch and Galaxy Buds 3 Series to Get AI-Powered Gemini Integration Soon

description: Sony said on Wednesday that it sees a JPY 100 billion ($700 million or roughly Rs. 5,975 crore) impact from US levies in the year to March and expects an operating profit of ¥1.28 trillion (roughly Rs. 74,353 crore). Over the first three months of this year, Sony reported better-than-expected operating income of JPY 203.7 billion (roughly Rs. 11,836 crore).
title: Sony Sells 18.5 Million PS5 Units in FY 2024, Analysts Say GTA 6 Delay to Impact Sales in 2025

description: TikTok is introducing a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature that will allow users to turn an image into an animated video. On Tuesday, the vertical video-based social media platform announced a new AI feature dubbed AI Alive that uses generative AI technology to create videos from photos. Currently, the tool can only be used to generate videos in TikTok Stories, and not directly to the feed.
title: TikTok Introduces New AI Alive Tool to Create Videos From Photos in Stories

description: The overall valuation of the crypto sector surged by 3.15 percent over the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether, both saw gains on Wednesday. Most altcoins followed suit with Solana, Dogecoin, and Polkadot also registering profits.
title: Bitcoin Price Hovers Above $103,000 as Values of Most Altcoins Rise

description: Google is said to be testing the placement of an “AI Mode” button on the Search home page. Several netizens found an AI Mode button added in different locations on the page, and posted about it on social media. Based on these screenshots, the Mountain View-based tech giant is experimenting with the placement of the feature when it finally rolls out to a wider user base.
title: Google Said to Be Testing ‘AI Mode’ Button on Search, May Replace ‘I’m Feeling Lucky’

description: Nothing, the UK-based original equipment manufacturer (OEM), has announced a strategic partnership with KEF, a high-end British audio product manufacturing company which produces high-fidelity speakers, subwoofers, wireless speakers, and headphones. Nothing further teases the launch of new audio products later this year, which are likely to be tuned by KEF.
title: Nothing Announces Partnership With KEF Audio; Teases New Product Launch Later This Year

description: Samsung's Galaxy Ring was launched during an Galaxy Unpacked in July 2024 alongside the Galaxy Z 6 series foldable smartphones. Now, the South Korean tech giant has announced a limited edition of its fitness ring alongside the new Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone. The new variant is called "Galaxy Ring Two-Tone Titanium Black", blending elements of the Titanium Black and Titanium Silver styles.
title: Samsung Galaxy Ring Limited-Edition in Two-Tone Titanium Black Unveiled Alongside Galaxy S25 Edge

description: Tastefully Yours is a romantic Korean drama streaming on Netflix India. It tells the story of two chefs whose love brews over food and rivalry. This Korean drama features Kang Ha-neul, Go Min-si in the lead roles, while Kim Shin-rok and Yoo Su-bin as supporting roles who add humour and emotions to the storyline. The series is directed by Park Dan-hee and produced by Han Jun-hee.
title: Tastefully Yours Season 1 Now Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Know About Romantic Korean Drama

description: The Accidental Getaway Driver is an American Thriller Drama movie that revolves around a Vietnamese cab driver, who accepts the booking of the three Orange County convicts. Unaware of their identity, he picks them up and later becomes their hostage at Gunpoint. Will he help them escape, or are there any other games awaiting? Watch only on Prime Video.
title: The Accidental Getaway Driver Now Available For Rent on Prime Video

description: The Second Best Hospital In The Galaxy Season 2 is back with the familiar faces and the fantastic Dr. Sleech and Dr. Kalk. This time, their fame will be interrupted by a journalist who is digging way too deeply into the past. Will this happiness persist? Watch Season 2 only on Prime Video from 27th May, 2025 onwards.
title: The Second Best Hospital In The Galaxy Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: The Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-In) has warned users of security vulnerabilities affecting Android, iOS, and iPadOS devices. Separate advisories warn of a denial-of-service flaw impacting iPhones and iPads on recent software versions, and multiple issues in Android that could grant unauthorised device access.
title: CERT-In Warns of Multiple Vulnerabilities Affecting Millions of iOS and Android Devices

description: Nubia Z70S Ultra has been unveiled in select global markets alongside the Nubia Pad Pro. The smartphone comes with a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC paired with up to 16GB of RAM and a 6,600mAh battery with 80W fast charging support. For optics, it carries a 50-megapixel triple rear camera sensor including a 64-megapixel telephoto shooter.
title: Nubia Z70S Ultra With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 64-Megapixel Telephoto Camera Goes Global

description: India's smart TV shipments recorded growth of 8.6 percent year-over-year (YoY) in 2024, pointed out International Data Corporation (IDC). The growth was fueled primarily by the increased demand for smart TVs with 55-inch and larger displays and a rise in offline shipments, the report stated. Samsung led India's smart TV market in the previous year with a 16.1 percent share, closely followed by LG. Chinese tech brand Xiaomi, TCL and Sony came in the top five.
title: Smart TV Shipments in India Grew 8.6 Percent YoY in 2024, Samsung Leads the Market: IDC

description: Google on Tuesday kicked off a series of announcements related to Android as part of the recently announced ‘The Android Show: I/O Edition’. One of the first yet notable announcements is Material 3 Expressive, its next iteration of the open-source design language system for Android. As per the Mountain View-based tech giant, Material 3 Expressive has personalisation at its core, enabling users to customise their device which feels unique to them.
title: Google Announces Material 3 Expressive With Updated Dynamic Colour Themes for Android

description: SanDisk WD Black SN8100 NVMe SSD (solid-state drive) was launched in India on Wednesday. Sitting atop other products in the company’s WD Black lineup, the SN8100 model caters to high-performance gaming and artificial intelligence (AI) workloads. Built upon PCIe Gen5 technology, the NVMe SSD is claimed to have sequential read speeds up to 14.9GBps and up to 8TB capacities. It leverages SanDisk’s BiCS8 TLC (Triple-Level Cell) 3D NAND technology for delivering a balance between performance and reliability.
title: Sandisk WD Black SN8100 NVMe SSD With Up to 14.9Gbps Read Speeds Launched in India
